SELECT account.id id, account.busi_no busiNo, account.acc_no accNo, account.cust_no custNo, account.acc_balance accBalance, account.acc_freeze accFreeze, account.acc_avai accAvai, account.create_time accCreateTime, account.modify_time accModifyTime, customer.name bussinessname, customer.cert_no bussinesscertno FROM `t_gq_fss_customer` customer,`t_gq_fss_account` account WHERE account.cust_no=customer.cust_no AND account.busi_no=#{busiNo}
AND account.acc_no Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{accNo}),'%')
AND account.cust_no Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{custNo}),'%')
AND customer.name Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{bussinessname}),'%')
AND customer.cert_no Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{bussinesscertno}),'%')
